data.title: Anri: Name Meaning, Origin, History, And Popularity
data.meta_description: Anri is a name with interesting meanings and connotations in different cultures. Discover the name‚Äôs rich significance and interesting variations here.
data.text:
In This Article

Origin, Meaning, And History Of Anri

Anri is both a masculine and feminine name. It is a masculine Georgian name and a form of the popular name Henri. Henri is a French form of Henry, which means ‚Äòhome ruler.‚Äô Apart from Georgian origins, Anri is also a gender-neutral name in Japanese and Abkhazian cultures.

As a Japanese name for a boy or girl, it is written in the Kanji script. Also, its meaning changes according to the way Kanji characters are placed.

Some common meanings of Anri in Japanese are ‚Äòapricot,‚Äô ‚Äòjasmine flower,‚Äô ‚Äòcalm,‚Äô ‚Äòpeaceful,‚Äô ‚Äòbeautiful,‚Äô and ‚Äòlovely.‚Äô As a feminine name in Japanese, Anri can mean ‚Äòpear tree,‚Äô ‚Äòlassy,‚Äô ‚Äògem,‚Äô and ‚Äòplum.‚Äô

Anri is also a Finnish gender-neutral name. In this culture, it is a short form of Annrika, which combines the names Ann and Rika. Since this name has multiple origins, its variations are also manifold. It is spelled Henrik in Armenian, Endika in Basque, Enric in Catalan, and Henrik in Croatian. Heinz and Henning are the German variations, and Enrique is the Spanish form.

Anri has many famous bearers. For example, Anri Jokhadze is a Georgian singer who represented his country in the Eurovision Song Contest 2008. He was the backing vocalist for Diana Gurtskaya‚Äôs Peace Will Come. Anri is the stage name of Japanese pop singer Eiko Kawashima. Her song Cat‚Äôs Eye was used as the first opening theme for the 1983 anime series of the same name. Anri Grigorov is a Bulgarian sprinter who is ranked third among the Bulgarian 100-meter sprinters.

This name is also a part of games and fiction. Anri is the princess of Guardiana in the Shining Force video game. In the video game RPG Dark Souls III, Anri of Astora is an NPC. This name is also found in the Japanese light novel series Durarara!!, written by Ryohgo Narita. Anri Sonohara is a primary character in it.

Before you finalize your baby‚Äôs name, you would want to assess if the name is rare or popular. Digital footprint of the name - it‚Äôs presence on the internet and social media platforms - can provide you with valuable insights on it‚Äôs popularity. A name‚Äôs online presence is an important metric for new parents to evaluate their options and make an informed choice. How many people are searching the name on Google, how many profiles are there on Facebook, does the name have a Wikipedia page? Such information surely tells you if the name is ubiquitous or unique. Anagram Names Of Anri

William Shakespeare is known for his ‚Äòonomastic wit,‚Äô with anagrams being one of them (remember the play Twelfth Night?). Anagram is the rearrangement of the same letters to form different words. Anagramming names has been in vogue for centuries now, and why not when it can create some cute names? Anagram baby names stand out with their unique sound and spellings. You may try an anagram of your name or your partner‚Äôs; even better if you combine both names and then try an anagram for the baby. It all stays in the family this way. You may also try anagram names for siblings, especially twins. Here are some anagrams of Anri.

Anri‚Äôs Zodiac Sign As Per Western Astrology

Western astrology includes the construction of a horoscope based on the person‚Äôs exact time of birth and location to understand the positions of the planet, stars, and zodiac signs at that time. However, in popular culture, it is often narrowed down to the sun sign, which depends on the person‚Äôs birth date.There are 12 zodiac signs, each having dominant traits, planetary rulers, elemental connection, and more.

Zodiac sign or Sun sign

The Earth‚Äôs orbit around the sun is divided into 12 zodiac signs covering 30-degree sectors. According to Western astrology, the zodiac or sun sign depends on the sun‚Äôs position in one of these sectors at the time of your birth. Starting from the sun‚Äôs position at the March equinox, the chart goes anti-clockwise from Aries, followed by Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, and Pisces. These signs are ruled by planetary bodies - Mars, Venus, Mercury, Moon, Sun, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, and Neptune. Furthermore, they are categorized into triplicities or elemental signs - fire, water, air, and earth - that govern their characteristics. Each of these zodiac signs features certain personality traits that may determine how a person presents themselves.

Each zodiac sign in Western astrology is linked to a specific range of dates in the year. Unlike Vedic astrology, where names can sometimes be used to infer astrological details, Western astrology relies entirely on the birth date.

To know more about your baby‚Äôs zodiac sign, choose the period in which your baby‚Äôs date of birth falls, from the options given below. This will give you a glimpse into the world of astrology tailored for your baby.

Anri‚Äôs Zodiac Sign And Birth Star As Per Vedic Astrology

Anri Personality Traits As Per Numerology

The numerology belief system envisages a relationship between a name and numbers. The related numbers are believed to give insights into a person‚Äôs character. We have researched this area to connect the numerology-based characteristic traits to the letters of the English alphabet. And the results are fascinating.

Numerology followers believe that each letter signifies attributes that can influence a person‚Äôs attitude and approach. Among these placements, the most significant are the first letter (Cornerstone) and the last letter (Capstone) of a name. Cornerstone highlights your primary personality traits and explains how you face challenges and opportunities in life. Capstone can tell you about your approach to work and how you complete them. Often, a letter may be repeated twice or more in a name. This repetition signifies the intensification or amplification of the traits associated with the letter in an individual‚Äôs personality.

Read to know what characteristics the name Anri is known for in numerology. Here we have avoided repetition of letters and added them just once for a better reading experience.
